text:
Article from “Der Welt Spiegel”, March 29, 1917

Thanks to Xavier Chevallier for rediscovering the grave of my grand father

MOMA - August Gaul was a close friend of Benno Berneis.
He was a sculpter working mostly with animals - Benno was one of 2 people for whom August make a bust
